title: Silver Jeans Co. Men's Zac Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jeans
description: EFFORTLESSLY COOL DENIM. Our Zac Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jeans are the denim staple your closet needs. These pants feature 5-pocket styling and a zip fly and button closure. Available in a variety of washes, this style is versatile and timeless.

FIT MATTERS. For jeans that aren't too tight, but just right, go for our men's relaxed fit. The straight leg style makes them great for casual wear, work, or dressing up. Rise: Sits just below the waist with a relaxed hip and thigh; Leg Opening: 19''
STYLE MEETS COMFORT. Zac is a casual, relaxed fit, made for the guy who wants to be comfortable and look good. These jeans are looser and roomier than a skinny jean and are great for everyday.
MADE FOR EVERYDAY. These jeans are made from a premium denim material for comfort and style that's unmatched. The cotton-blend material, offers an easy to wear denim designed for all day wear.
A VERSATILE CHOICE. These jeans for men feature a signature small "S" scroll at the back pockets for a classic look with a little extra flair.

Zac is a casual, relaxed fit, made for the guy who wants to be comfortable and look good. It sits below the waist, and the relaxed fit through the thigh is great for everyday. Finished with a 19” leg opening.
